name: slyce-grid-system
description: Customizable grid system that can be utilied in any project
author: Vinicius Kiss <contato@vkiss.com.br>

scripts.concat: concat -o build/slyce.scss config.scss slyce/mixins.scss slyce/content/body-config.scss slyce/content/container.scss slyce/content/row.scss slyce/content/col.scss slyce/content/col-offset.scss slyce/content/vertical-align.scss slyce/content/vertical-offset.scss slyce/content/hide.scss
scripts.build: rimraf build && npm run sass && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:scss: rimraf build && mkdir build && npm run concat
